pr_title: Add KafkaConnect to the Prometheus ServiceMonitor example.

timeline.message:
Add KafkaConnect to the Prometheus ServiceMonitor example.

Signed-off-by: Allan Moso <allan.moso@gmail.com>

Add KafkaConnect to the Prometheus ServiceMonitor example.

Signed-off-by: Allan Moso <allan.moso@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Does it work when it is instead written as YAML like the rest of the file?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  - {key: "strimzi.io/kind", operator: In, values: ["Kafka", "KafkaConnect"]}
          
          
            
                  - key: strimzi.io/kind
          
          
            
                    operator: In
          
          
            
                    values: 
          
          
            
                      - Kafka
          
          
            
                      - KafkaConnect
timeline.author: scholzj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,8 +6,8 @@ metadata:
     app: strimzi
 spec:
   selector:
-    matchLabels:
-      strimzi.io/kind: Kafka
+    matchExpressions:
+      - {key: "strimzi.io/kind", operator: In, values: ["Kafka", "KafkaConnect"]}

replies.bodyText: Yes, it works in YAML form. I went ahead and changed it.
replies.author: allanmoso

timeline.message:
Switched ServiceMonitor matchExpression to YAML form.

Signed-off-by: Allan Moso <allan.moso@gmail.com>

Switched ServiceMonitor matchExpression to YAML form.

Signed-off-by: Allan Moso <allan.moso@gmail.com>
